    • Constructor Detail

      • AbstractWebServer

        @Inject
public AbstractWebServer(javax.net.ServerSocketFactory srvSockFactory,
                        int port,
                        java.lang.String baseDir,
                        java.lang.String welcomeFile,
                        int numSocketReaders,
                        int numRequestHandlers,
                        int sizeSocketQueue,
                        int sizeRequestQueue,
                        int sessionTimeout)
                  throws java.lang.ClassNotFoundException
        Constructs the WebServer
        Parameters:
        srvSockFactory - The ServerSocketFactory to be used for creating a single ServerSocket for listening for clients requests
        port - The port number to bounded by the ServerSocket
        baseDir - The base directory of the server in the file system (absolute path)
        welcomeFile - The file should be returned upon request of the base directory
        numSocketReaders - number of socket-reader threads
        numRequestHandlers - number of request-handler threads
        sizeSocketQueue - size of the socket queue (how many client sockets are saved)
        sizeRequestQueue - size of the socket queue (how many requests are saved)
        sessionTimeout - session timeout in milliseconds from last activity.
        Throws:
        java.lang.ClassNotFoundException
